short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All your important Tasks, organized in one spot!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The purpose of this Chrome extension is to provide users with a simple and intuitive way to manage and organize their tasks. This supports effective time management and enhances productivity. The extension is specifically designed to integrate seamlessly into the Chrome browsing experience, enabling quick access to your to-do list without needing to navigate away from your currently opened webpage.

The key features of this extension include:
- Task Addition: Enables users to add new tasks to their to-do list.
- Search Function: Includes a search feature to locate specific tasks quickly.
- Notes Option: Allows for adding additional notes to each task for further details or reminders.
- Drag and Drop: Facilitates the rearrangement of tasks through a simple drag-and-drop mechanism.
- Dark Mode: Provides an eye-friendly dark mode for users who prefer a darker screen.
- Date Selection: Provides the option to assign specific dates to tasks. (Work in Progress)
- Prioritization: Allows users to assign priority levels to tasks, ensuring important tasks are highlighted. (Work in Progress)
- Categorization: Enables users to sort tasks into categories for better organization. (Work in Progress)

By Nils Oborny
